i.name: Ionian Fervor
i.description: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.

q.name: Bladesurge
q.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.

w.name: Defiant Dance
w.description: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.

e.name: Flawless Duet
e.description: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.

r.name: Vanguard's Edge
r.description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it.

riot.name: Defiant Dance
riot.description: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.
riot.tooltip:
First Cast: Irelia aligns her blades into a defensive formation, gaining {{ finalphysicaldr }}% physical damage reduction, but she is unable to act while holding her formation.

Second Cast: Irelia swipes her blades, dealing {{ mindamagecalc }} physical damage. Damage increases with charge time, up to {{ maxdamagecalc }} after {{ chargetimeformax }} seconds.

Defiant Dance cannot be interrupted.

description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Irelia''' {{ct|windup|winds up|cast=false|items=false|move=false|consume=Disabled, but can still use trinkets|spells=true,false,false,recast|silence=false}} for up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which she reduces incoming {{as|physical damage}} by 50% {{as|(+ 7% per 100 AP)}}.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} After a {{fd|0.07}}-second delay, '''Irelia''' swipes with her blades in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies around her and in a line, increased by {{pp|11|key=%|type=channel time|0 to 100|0 to 0.75|formula=10% per 0.075 seconds. ''This is capped at 0.75 seconds.''}}.
The {{sbc|Second Cast}} activates automatically toward the cursor's direction at the end of the duration.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|10 to 70}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|10*2 to 70*2}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Defiant Dance
notes: * Quick Casting utilizes hold-and-release for the two casts.
* ''Defiant Dance'' reaches 100% physical damage reduction at {{as|{{fd|714.29}} AP}}.

riot.name: Flawless Duet
riot.description: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.
riot.tooltip:
Irelia readies 2 blades that will fly towards each other once placed, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and stunning for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

Champions and large monsters are Marked for {{ markduration }} seconds.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' sends a blade to the target location for up to {{fd|3.5}} seconds. After a {{fd|0.35}}-second delay, ''Flawless Duet'' may be recast to send another blade out, and does so automatically at '''Irelia's''' position if the first blade would expire, though not if she is {{tip|mute|muted}}.
Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other after a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} all enemies struck for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
e1.name: Flawless Duet
notes: * Irelia can launch the second blade even if {{tip|silence|silenced}}.
* Attempting to make a new cast during the stun animation will cause its missles to fizzle instead of launching.
* The stun animation will pair all blades with the last cast, but only the most recent pair will register.

riot.name: Vanguard's Edge
riot.description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it.
riot.tooltip:
Irelia launches a storm of blades that explode outward upon hitting a champion. The blades deal {{ missiledamage }} magic damage and Mark champions and large monsters for {{ markduration }} seconds.

Irelia then forms the blades into a wall for {{ zoneduration }} seconds. Passing through the wall deals {{ zonedamage }} magic damage and slows by {{ slowamount }}% for {{ ccduration }} seconds.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' launches a barrage of blades through a wide line in the target direction, exploding outwards upon hitting a [[champion]], dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck.

The blades form into a spade-shaped perimeter around the explosion for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, knocking aside all enemies, though not rendering them {{tip|airborne}}. Enemies that pass through the blades are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
r1.name: Vanguard's Edge
notes: * Enemies that cross the perimeter are '''not''' {{as|marked|buzzword}} for {{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}}.
